arts.ttl: Las Palmas win in Valencia as home fans protest against Singapore owner
arts.sum: Thousands of Valencia fans protested against owner Peter Lim and the reported detention of two fans in Lim’s home country of Singapore before and after its 3-2 loss to Las Palmas in La Liga on Monday. The game started well for the home side with Pepelu putting Valencia ahead from the penalty spot after 14 minutes.

arts.ttl: Sevilla boss García Pimienta labels Barcelona star ‘a competitive animal’
arts.sum: Sevilla head coach García Pimienta was keen to reveal his admiration for Barcelona star Ansu Fati, on the back of the meeting between the clubs on Sunday. Barca and Sevilla…

Both teams are in difficult situations in the standings, with Los Che occupying 18th place and the Canaries in last. Valencia are looking to continue their good defensive dynamic at home and pick up ...
